entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
